{
  "full_name": "John Alex Doe",
  "email": "john.doe23d@example.com",
  "phone": "+9715012345867",
  "password": "SecurePass123",
  "client_code": "CL-2024-0026",
  
  // New client fields
  "company_name": "ABC Corporation LLC",
  "tax_id": "TAX-123456789",
  "country": "United Arab Emirates",
  "city": "Dubai",
  "address": "Business Bay, Tower 1, Office 1501",
  "zip_code": "12345",
  "currency_id": null,
  "registration_date": "2024-01-15",
  "business_type": "Limited Liability Company",
  "industry": "Security Services",
  "website": "https://abccorp.ae",
  "contact_person": "Jane Smith",
  "contact_person_phone": "+971501234568",
  "license_number": "TRN-789012345",
  "notes": "Premium client with multiple sites. Requires 24/7 security services.",
  "is_active": true,
  
  // Profile image - sent as form-data file (not in JSON)
  // "profile_image": (File) profile.jpg
  
  // Sites data (optional)
  "sites": [
    {
      "site_name": "Head Office Tower",
      "site_instruction": "24/7 security required. All guards must have first aid training.",
      "address": "Business Bay, Dubai",
      "guards_required": 4,
      "latitude": 25.197197,
      "longitude": 55.274372,
      "status": "running",
      
      // Site locations (optional)
      "locations": [
        {
          "title": "Main Entrance",
          "description": "Primary security checkpoint",
          "latitude": 25.197200,
          "longitude": 55.274380,
          "is_active": true
        },
        {
          "title": "Parking Level B2",
          "description": "Underground parking security post",
          "latitude": 25.197190,
          "longitude": 55.274360,
          "is_active": true
        },
        {
          "title": "Rooftop Helipad",
          "description": "Restricted area - VIP access only",
          "latitude": 25.197210,
          "longitude": 55.274390,
          "is_active": true
        }
      ],
      
      // Document types for site (optional - for file uploads)
      "site_document_types": ["site_map", "safety_plan", "emergency_procedures"]
    },
    {
      "site_name": "Warehouse Facility JAFZA",
      "site_instruction": "Night shift security only. Focus on perimeter security.",
      "address": "Jebel Ali Free Zone, Plot 1234",
      "guards_required": 3,
      "latitude": 24.997197,
      "longitude": 55.074372,
      "status": "running",
      
      "locations": [
        {
          "title": "East Gate",
          "description": "Main entry for trucks and deliveries",
          "latitude": 24.997200,
          "longitude": 55.074380,
          "is_active": true
        },
        {
          "title": "West Gate",
          "description": "Employee entrance",
          "latitude": 24.997190,
          "longitude": 55.074370,
          "is_active": true
        }
      ],
      
      "site_document_types": ["site_layout", "fire_safety", "operating_license"]
    },
    {
      "site_name": "Residential Complex - Marina",
      "site_instruction": "Residential security with visitor management",
      "address": "Dubai Marina, Tower B",
      "guards_required": 2,
      "latitude": 25.079197,
      "longitude": 55.144372,
      "status": "planned",
      
      "locations": [
        {
          "title": "Lobby Entrance",
          "description": "Main building entrance",
          "latitude": 25.079200,
          "longitude": 55.144380,
          "is_active": true
        }
      ],
      
      "site_document_types": ["floor_plan", "access_control"]
    }
  ],
  
  // Client documents (optional - for file uploads)
  "client_document_types": ["trade_license", "tax_certificate", "company_registration", "insurance_certificate"],
  
  // Contacts data (optional)
  "contacts": [
    {
      "name": "Jane Smith",
      "phone": "+971501234568",
      "email": "jane.smith@abccorp.ae",
      "position": "Operations Manager",
      "department": "Operations",
      "is_primary": true,
      "notes": "Main point of contact for all security matters"
    },
    {
      "name": "Robert Johnson",
      "phone": "+971501234569",
      "email": "robert.johnson@abccorp.ae",
      "position": "Finance Director",
      "department": "Finance",
      "is_primary": false,
      "notes": "Handles billing and payments"
    },
    {
      "name": "Sarah Williams",
      "phone": "+971501234570",
      "email": "sarah.williams@abccorp.ae",
      "position": "HR Manager",
      "department": "Human Resources",
      "is_primary": false,
      "notes": "For guard personnel matters"
    }
  ],
  
  // Additional media categories (optional - for file uploads)
  "media_categories": ["company_logo", "office_photos", "team_photos", "certificates"]
}

    "emergency_contact_name": "Jane Smith",
    "emergency_contact_phone": "+971501234568",
    "emergency_contact_relation": "Sister",
    "notes": "Excellent performance record. Trained in advanced security protocols."
  },
  
  "document_types": ["passport", "visa", "driver_license", "national_id"]
}
